  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CharConversionException
    This is a platform independent class used to represent character conversion exceptions (e.g.
    IOException
    This is a platform independent class used to represent I/O exceptions, taking the place of java.io.IOException in JSimple based code.
    PathNotFoundException
    This is a platform independent class used to represent file not found exceptions, taking the place of java.io.FileNotFoundException in JSimple based code.
